Welcome to ``light_emoji`` Documentation
==============================================================================

Documentation for ``light_emoji``.


.. _install:

Install
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

``light_emoji`` is released on PyPI, so all you need is:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install light_emoji

To upgrade to latest version:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install --upgrade light_emoji
